text: Vibrant indepth worship where parishers can pray, worship in song, flags, dance and art. More importantly, the vibrant community stays behind to interact, bond and care for one another
Great Family church where I had my wedding in year 2023 at Chapel and a baby room for my newborn son in year 2024. Fellowship at Atrium :)
Very welcoming atmosphere! Very family orientated as well!
great church, the ambience is really good and the people are very nice :)) definitely come and bring your friends to learn about christ!! everyone is welcome

The toilets are very clean, would recommend. However, the lights are motion activated and after 6.30-7pm it would switch off if you dont move. It isnt that stinky, and there is a supermarket nearby so you get can snacks and stay in there. The wifi in there is bad though, but there is aircon so its not really warm. The cubicles are regular sized, and there is one handicap toilet on the ground floor, which i recommend if there are very little people in the bathroom, but don't clog it up because theres quite alot of old people. The sinks and clean as well. 4/5 for me because of the quotes on the door. It can really ruin my mood when reading angst because its too hopeful.
